title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Criminal Minds Video: As JJ Seeks Help, Aimee Garcia Previews ‘Intimate’ Scenes With a ‘Magical’ A.J. Cook
description: Special Agent JJ Jareau really needs help, and Dr. Julia Ochoa may be the one to give it to her. In this Thursday’s episode of Paramount+s Criminal Minds: Evolution — titled “The Brutal Man” (as in the next UnSub discovered to be under Sicarius’ sway) — JJ (played by A.J. Cook) seeks out an unorthodox […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Prison Break Reboot Casts Emmy Winner Margo Martindale as Warden
description: Hulu’s Prison Break reboot has hired a big gun to rule the roost. Three-time Emmy winner Margo Martindale (Justified, The Americans) is set to guest-star in the pilot as Jessica Strand, the warden of one of the deadliest prisons in America. With filming starting next week in West Virginia, other newly cast guest stars include […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
